      • putFormIntoSession

        public void putFormIntoSession(Form form,
                               ninja.session.Session session)
        Description copied from interface: IController
        Puts bowl data from a user interface form into the session instance.

        Checks every bowl value from session instance for null value. If bowl value is null it will be replaced by a whitespace character.

        Specified by:
        putFormIntoSession in interface IController
        Overrides:
        putFormIntoSession in class AbstractEntityController
        Parameters:
        form - the Form instance
        session - the Ninja Session instance
